entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is the one who leaned forward and passed the Deluminator to Ron. He is described as watching Ron.

entities.name: deluminator
entities.description: The Deluminator is a valuable object that Dumbledore designed. It has the power to suck all light from a place and restore it with a simple click.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron took the Deluminator and turned it over in his fingers, looking stunned.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who designed the Deluminator. He remembered Ron in his will.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour passed the Deluminator to Ron.
Ron took possession of the Deluminator.
Dumbledore remembered Ron in his will.
